content:
The specified line cannot be parsed because its fields have widths other than those specified.

To correct this error

  • Adjust FieldWidths so the line can be parsed correctly, or insert exception-handling code in order to handle the line.

See Also

How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats
My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFieldParser Method
Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object
TextFieldParser Object
TextFieldParser.FieldWidths Property
TextFieldParser.SetFieldWidths Method
